Package io.netty.handler.ssl.ocsp

Certificate validation using OCSP

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IoTransport
    IoTransport holds EventLoop, SocketChannel and DatagramChannel for DNS I/O.
    OcspClientHandler
    A handler for SSL clients to handle and act upon stapled OCSP responses.
    OcspResponse  
    OcspServerCertificateValidator
    OcspServerCertificateValidator validates incoming server's certificate using OCSP.
    OcspValidationEvent  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OcspResponse.Status
